item.title: Report X-2024041278
item.description:
Report X-2024041278

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-29T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-24
  • City: TROUTDALE
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE NOTICED TO BE WET. INSPECTION REVEALED INNER 1 GALLON BOTTLE WAS BAGGED AND THE BAG CONTAINED LOOSE LIQUID. THE LIQUID LEAKED FROM BAG INTO OUTER CARTON. I CANNOT DETECT ANY HOLES OR CRACKS IN THE BOTTLE. SHIPPER IS SENDING 1 GALLON IN CARTON CAPBLE OF HOLDING 4 GALLONS WITH LITTLE INNER PACKING MATERIAL.

item.title: Report X-2024041348
item.description:
Report X-2024041348

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-29T15:12:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-19
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE DUE TO THE RATTLE OF AEROSOLS CANS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED (12) 12 OUNCE AEROSOL CANS OF FLAMMABLE CUMMINS ONAN GREEN SPRAY PAINT. INNER BOXES MARKED WITH THE LIMITED QUANTITY MARKING. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX.

item.title: Report X-2024041166
item.description:
Report X-2024041166

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-26T15:12:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-11
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKING PACKAGE FOUND ON EAST PRIMARY BELT. RESPONDER CALLED. RESPONDER RESPONDED FOLLOWING APPROPRIATE UPS RESPONSE PROTOCOLS. RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGING CONTAINED LEAKING BATTERY, BROUGHT PACKAGE BACK TO PSC. ANOTHER RESPONDER IDENTIFIED PACKAGE AS POSSIBLE UNDECLARED HAZMAT, STARTED UPS UNDECLARED HAZMAT PROCESS. NOTICED INTERIOR BOX HAD APPROPRIATE CORROSIVE HAZMAT MARKINGS, WHILE EXTERIOR BOX LACKED THEM.

item.title: Report X-2024041155
item.description:
Report X-2024041155

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-26T15:12:30+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-09
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKING CONTENTS WERE DISCOVERED DURING UNLOADING OF PACKAGE. HAZMAT RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO CLEAN UP SPILL RESIDUE AND REMOVE PACKAGE TO PSC FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. DAMAGE INSPECTION; NON REGULATED PRODUCT LEAKED; NO LEAK TO AEROSOLS.
